mysteries.Title: Library
mysteries.Plot: Within the library's hallowed walls, Meerah unravels the cryptic tomes, unveiling the forgotten pact between Azaroth and a long-lost soul, intertwining fate, and revealing the castle's darkest secret.

mysteries.Title: Hall
mysteries.Plot: In the grand hall's shadows, Meerah deciphers arcane symbols, triggering an ethereal portal. As echoes of a tragic past resound, the veil between realms thins, unearthing Azaroth's deepest secrets.

mysteries.Title: Ballroom
mysteries.Plot: The ballroom's haunting elegance conceals a spectral dance of trapped souls. Meerah, guided by ghostly whispers, unravels the tragic tale, exposing a curse that binds them to eternal waltz.

mysteries.Title: DiningRoom
mysteries.Plot: In the dining room's opulence, Meerah unearths a banquet of spectral echoes. Each phantom feast reveals a fragment of Azaroth's tragic history, as the walls whisper tales of betrayal and revenge.

mysteries.Title: Stairs
mysteries.Plot: The winding stairs echo with forgotten whispers as Meerah ascends, unveiling hidden passages and ethereal visions. Each step reveals the castle's tangled history, leading her closer to Azaroth's secret chamber.

mysteries.Title: Studio
mysteries.Plot: In the music studio's haunting melody, Meerah unravels a symphony of lost memories. Ghostly notes unveil Azaroth's tragic past, intertwining with Meerah's fate, as she inches closer to the castle's heart.
